detail_desc: Tankini top and bottoms. Striped top with a sailor collar and bow and a seam at the hem with a flounce. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Large metal earrings with faceted plastic beads. Diameter approx. 3.5 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine knit containing some wool and glittery threads.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif and lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal chain necklace. Length 57 cm.
Patterned handkerchief in wool. Size 32x32 cm.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Jacquard-knit slippers with a hook and loop fastening at the back of the shaft, soft pile linings and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
V-neck satin top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a frill trim at the top.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton with a broderie anglaise collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Longer layer in woven fabric at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs, including two pairs of hoops. Sizes from 0.5 cm to 6 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Ballet slippers with a decorative bow at the front and a glittery elastic strap over the foot. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck cami top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace details at the sides.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
Scratch mittens in soft organic cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs. No thumbs.

Short dress in mesh with embroidered, textured appliqués, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded, sewn-in cups. Narrow silicone trim at the top, support panels in the sides and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and skirt with two layers of twill lining. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in cotton jersey with a round neckline, dropped shoulder seams and a gathered seam at the hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie or bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and rounded hems. Soft mesh inner shorts.
3/4-length leggings in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Wide jumper in a rib-knit nylon blend with a deep V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Round-necked vest tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Crop top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and wide ribbing at the hem. The polyamide content of the top is partly recycled. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Shirt in premium cotton with a cutaway collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Varying pattern on the inside of the cuffs and collar stand. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Top in softly draping silk with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with frill-trimmed shoulder straps.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft crinkled jersey made from recycled polyester. Smocking at the top and hem, decorative buttons down the front and long, wide sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Sports bag in imitation leather with two handles and a zip at the top, and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap. Two side compartments and one inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 25x25x52 cm.
Tube scarf in a soft rib knit. Width 30 cm, circumference 125 cm.

Wide tunic in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top, a double-layered yoke and gathered seams at the shoulders and neck. Gently dropped shoulders, long, voluminous sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and covered elastication at the hem.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut coat in a felted wool blend with buttons down the front, pockets in the side seams, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an extended section at the hem in a cotton weave. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Fitted dress in a patterned crêpe weave with a V-neck at the front and short, gathered puff sleeves. Seam at the waist, a gently flared skirt and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Maxi dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover top with a concealed press-stud and short sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a glow-in-the-dark print motif on the front and long sleeves.
Satin cami top with a lace trim, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and gentle draping at the top.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in softly draping jersey crêpe with a V-neck, seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wide A-line skirt. Lined over the bust.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in soft faux fur that can be fastened at the front. Satin lining. Size 18x130 cm.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood,  kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved Henley shirt in soft, textured cotton jersey with a small collar, button placket and chest pocket.
Small shoulder bag in imitation suede with a metal chain and imitation suede shoulder strap and flap with a braided detail and concealed magnetic fastener. Two compartments. Lined. Size 5x13x21 cm.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams, reflective details and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Elastication at the back of the waist, press-studs at the sides, elasticated hems and a reinforced elastic strap under the feet. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Tights in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in a textured cotton-blend weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist, pleats at the top and detachable tie belt. Fly with a concealed zip and button, and side pockets.
Fitted running top in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated hood, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes, reflective details and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length, cold shoulder dress in patterned, crinkled chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and two flounces at the top that continue over the arms. Gathered seam at the waist with narrow elastication and an airy, softly draping skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Trousers in a recycled polyester weave. High waist with pleats at the front, a zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
V-neck strappy top in ribbed jersey with buttons down the front.

Set with a T-shirt, pair of shorts and sun hat in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt that is slightly longer and rounded at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin.
Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Wide trousers in a patterned weave with side pockets and an elasticated waist with a soft belt.
Wide-fitting top in cotton jersey with short dolman sleeves.
Top in cotton jersey with a lace top layer at the front. Opening with a button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Jumper in a soft knit. Relaxed fit with long, raglan balloon sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Puff pants in organic cotton slub jersey with a front section in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Elastication and a decorative bow at the waist and elasticated, frill-trimmed hems.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details and soft fleece inside. Detachable hood with soft fleece inside and a stand-up collar with a zip and chin guard at the front. Front pockets, ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Small backpack in a patterned weave with a handle and zip at the top and adjustable shoulder straps. Outer compartment with a hook and loop fastening and a padded back plate and base. Width 18 cm. Height 22 cm.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 5.5 cm.

Tunic in crisp cotton seersucker with an opening and button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and short, voluminous puff sleeves. Seam with a drawstring under the bust and at the back. Lined with a detachable, V-neck inner top in a viscose weave. The inner top has narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, a double-layered drawstring hood with a wrapover front, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, a stand-up collar, zip down the front, zipped side pockets, and long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Cap in cotton twill and shoulder bag in a patterned weave. Cap with a fabric appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back. Bag with a glittery appliqué, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 13x19.5 cm.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
